title: Five-Star Marriott Momi Bay Luxury with Daily Buffet Breakfast, FJ$500 Resort Credit & Roundtrip Airport Transfers
description: Experience five-star island bliss with a stay at the stunning Fiji Marriott Resort Momi Bay, an overwater resort stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2022 award. With stunning, adults-only bures built over the sparkling lagoon and family-friendly rooms encircling the pristine white beachfront, there’s no sweeter location for your Fijian retreat. Order your favourite cocktail without having to leave the adults-only sunset pool, indulge in an aromatic massage or a facial at Quan Spa and feast on Fijian-Indian fusion cuisine at the lagoon-facing Goji Kitchen & Bar (plus four additional exquisite dining venues to choose from).
offer_address: Savusavu Road Momi Bay, Nadi, Fiji

title: Family-Friendly Fiji Beachfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast
description:
Set your watch to island time and escape to the award-winning Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort, a beachfront oasis located on Fiji’s spectacular Coral Coast. Whether you are travelling with kids or looking for romance, this spectacular retreat is the ideal destination for both couples and families, with a dedicated adults-only zone and plenty to keep younger guests entertained, including a Kids’ Club, activities for teens and a babysitting service.

Your sun-kissed escape includes daily breakfast, three themed dinners, a family pass to the resort's Fijian cultural show and a blissful 60-minute massage per adult.

**Travelling with family?** Two children aged 11 years and under stay, play and eat for free (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: Sydney Drive, Off The Queens Highway, Sigatoka, Fiji

title: Multi-Award-Winning Fiji Stay with Decadent Dining Inclusions
description: Set your watch to island time and escape to the multi-award-winning Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort, recently named Best Fijian Property 2018 and Best Family Resort Fiji 2018. This luxurious destination is situated on Fiji’s spectacular Coral Coast and is perfect for both couples and families, boasting a dedicated adults-only zone and plenty to keep younger guests entertained, including a Kids’ Club, activities for teens and a babysitting service. Included in this indulgent escape is a daily buffet breakfast, three themed buffet dinners, a family pass to a cultural fire-walking show, four 30-minute massage treatments to share and much more. Plus - up to two kids aged 12 and under stay, play and eat for free!
offer_address: Sydney Drive, Off The Queens Highway, Sigatoka, Fiji

title: Marriott Momi Bay Luxury with FJ$500 Resort Credit, Daily Breakfast & Roundtrip Airport Transfers (Select Packages Only)
description:
Experience five-star island bliss with a stay at the stunning Fiji Marriott Resort Momi Bay. With stunning, adults-only bures built over the sparkling lagoon and family-friendly rooms encircling the pristine white beachfront, there’s no sweeter location for your Fijian retreat. Order your favourite cocktail without having to leave the adults-only sunset pool, indulge in an aromatic massage or a facial at Quan Spa and feast on Fijian-Indian fusion cuisine at the lagoon-facing Goji Kitchen & Bar (plus four additional exquisite dining venues to choose from).

Perched along Viti Levu’s Coral Coast, this retreat feels boutique while remaining within easy driving distance to Nadi and Port Denarau, where cruises depart for the serene Yasawa and Mamanuca archipelagos. With direct access to a secluded jetty and a powder-white beachfront, this is your ideal launchpad to Fiji’s world-class dive sites and vibrant coral reefs.
offer_address: Savusavu Road Momi Bay, Nadi, Fiji

title: Family-Friendly Fiji Beachfront Luxury with Daily Dining & Two Kids Stay Free
description:
Set your watch to island time and escape to the award-winning Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort, a beachfront oasis located on the spectacular Coral Coast. Whether you're travelling with kids or looking for romance, this spectacular retreat is the ideal destination for both couples and families, with a dedicated adults-only zone and plenty to keep younger guests entertained, including a Kids’ Club, activities for teens and a babysitting service.

Make the most of Fiji's colourful coral reefs, lagoon waters and golden beaches that sparkle under the purple and red hues of the famous Fijian sunsets - all located just over an hour from Nadi Airport - and immerse yourself in the culture of Fiji through the resort’s programme of daily experiences. Explore the underwater world surrounding the island by snorkelling or kayaking, and get your fill of traditional Fijian customs with the opportunity to witness the seemingly impossible with a unique firewalking performance (select days only).
offer_address: Sydney Drive, Off The Queens Highway, Sigatoka, Fiji

title: Fiji Coral Coast Award-Winning Family-Friendly Escape with Roundtrip Flights for Two Adults, Daily Breakfast & Massages
description:
Set your watch to island time and switch into ultimate relaxation mode with an escape to the award-winning, five-star Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort, a beachfront oasis on Viti Levu’s spectacular Coral Coast.

Frequently listed as one of the Best Family Resorts in Fiji, the retreat sits on 40 acres of lush, tropical gardens with facilities reflective of its five-star status. Keep the little ones entertained for hours at one of two Kids Clubs while you head to the adults-only pool with a swim-up bar or indulge in a traditional Fijian spa treatment. Keep fit with a walk or run to the top of the Bushwalk Trail, or immerse yourself in the Fijian culture through the resort’s program of daily experiences, including a Kava Ceremony and Meke Performance. Snorkel or kayak in the sapphire-hued lagoon waters, then dine on the beach with your toes in the sand at Restaurant 1808 under the deep purple and red hues of the famous Fijian sunsets.
offer_address: Sydney Drive, Off The Queens Highway, Sigatoka, Fiji

title: Five-Star Marriott Momi Bay Luxury with All-Inclusive Dining, Roundtrip International Flights with Fiji Airways for Two Adults & Adults-Only Overwater Bures Available
description:
Experience five-star island bliss with a stay at the stunning Fiji Marriott Resort Momi Bay, an overwater resort stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice 2021 award. With stunning, adults-only bures built over the sparkling lagoon and family-friendly rooms encircling the pristine white beachfront, there’s no sweeter location for your Fijian retreat. There are three swimming pools to choose from, including a kids’ pool for the little ones. Order your favourite cocktail without having to leave the adults-only sunset pool, indulge in an aromatic massage or a facial at Quan Spa and feast on Fijian-Indian fusion cuisine at the lagoon-facing Goji Kitchen & Bar (plus four additional exquisite dining venues to choose from). To keep the kids entertained, Turtles Kids’ Club hosts an array of fun-filled activities, including a mini Amazing Race experience, basket weaving and Fijian dance lessons.

Perched along Viti Levu’s Coral Coast, this retreat feels boutique while remaining within easy driving distance to Nadi and Port Denarau, where cruises depart for the serene Yasawa and Mamanuca archipelagos. With direct access to a secluded jetty and a powder-white beachfront, this is your ideal launchpad to Fiji’s world-class dive sites and vibrant coral reefs.
offer_address: Savusavu Road Momi Bay, Nadi, Fiji

title: Fiji Mamanuca Islands Floating Day Club Experience with Dining Credit
description: Floating in Fiji's turquoise waters, in the heart of the Mamanuca Islands, is where you will find Seventh Heaven - a newly-launched slice of paradise. As the name suggests, now you too can experience the ultimate experience with a full-day 'Sip and Dip' experience aboard this solar-powered, outdoor floating platform. Relax at this two-storey, fun-filled pontoon and take in the laidback atmosphere that attracts families, couples, and groups looking for a dose of fun in paradise. Jump off the deck for a dip, snorkel the crystal-clear waters to marvel at the kaleidoscopic world below, tuck into an authentic wood-fired pizza, let the stress melt away with a massage or simply kick back on a sun lounger with a cocktail in hand. What more could you ask for?

Whether you're travelling with kids or seeking a romantic escape, this is the ideal destination for both couples and families. There's a dedicated adults-only zone and plenty to keep younger guests entertained, including a Kids’ Club, activities for teens and a babysitting service.

Surround yourself with Fiji's brilliant undersea marvels, sapphire-hued lagoon waters and sugar-sand beaches that sparkle under the deep purple and red hues of the famous Fijian sunsets. title: Luxe Family-Friendly Fiji Escape
description: A slice of seaside serenity in the heart of Fiji's adventure capital, this lush tropical paradise is expertly designed to delight the whole family. While children explore with their dedicated Nanuku buddy, parents can savour private treetop dining experiences, indulge in an island spa treatment or enjoy an intimate bonfire on the beach. Make new family memories spotting clownfish among vibrant coral or hunting for crabs in a mangrove forest, before enjoying incredible feasts of delicious local cuisine.

title: Outrigger Fiji Five-Star Family-Friendly Coral Coast Luxury
description:
Set your watch to island time and surrender to the laidback rhythm of Fiji at the five-star Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort - a beachfront haven nestled in the heart of the adventure-filled Coral Coast. This tropical sanctuary blends traditional charm with modern luxury, offering everything from sleek contemporary rooms to thatched beachfront bures inspired by classic Fijian design.

Perfect for both families and couples, the resort features a dedicated adults-only zone for peaceful moments, while younger guests are entertained with a vibrant kids’ club, teen activities and babysitting services. Immerse yourself in Fiji’s rich culture with daily experiences, from kava ceremonies to mesmerising firewalking performances (on select days).

Explore vibrant coral reefs and crystal-clear lagoons with snorkelling and kayaking adventures, or join the OUTRIGGER Zone coral planting program and play a part in preserving Fiji’s marine life. As the day ends, relax on sugar-soft sands and watch the sky come alive with the fiery hues of a Coral Coast sunset.
offer_address: Sydney Drive, Off The Queens Highway, Sigatoka, Fiji

title: Five-Star Beachfront Fiji Resort with 18-Hole Championship Golf Course
description: Nestled among white sands, swaying palm trees and 35 acres of tropical gardens, you'll find the five-star InterContinental Fiji Golf Resort & Spa. Sitting on the shores of Natadola Beach with unbeatable views of the Pacific Ocean and dazzling turqouise lagoon, the resort features stunning interior design and architecture, heavily inspired by a traditional Fijian village. An 18-hole championship golf course is the jewel in the resort's crown, where golf enthusiasts of all skill levels can practice their swing alongside dramatic, beachfront landscapes. After completing the course, take a breather with a decadent seafood meal at one of the onsite restaurants or massage your worries and aches away at the luxurious Spa InterContinental. End the night with a locally-inspired cocktail at Kama Lounge while enjoying a selection of authentic Fiji entertainment, including live music and South Pacific fire dancing.
offer_address: Maro Road, Natadola Bay, Viti Levu, Fiji
